definition: the Band-tightening Spell (in 西遊記|西游记[Xi1 you2 Ji4])/a spell or incantation for controlling sb
tight/strict/close at hand/near/urgent/tense/hard up/short of money/to tighten
hoop/to bind with hoops
incantation/magic spell/curse/malediction/to revile/to put a curse on sb
variant of 咒[zhou4]

sentences.english: I am thankful to have broken a spell.
sentences.chinese: 谢天谢地，我已经打破了一个紧箍咒。

sentences.english: Ann: Yes, the Nobel Peace Prize is an inhibiting magic phrase.
sentences.chinese: 对啊，诺贝尔和平奖就是紧箍咒。

sentences.english: It is interesting. It seems that it's Tripitaka's Curse.
sentences.chinese: 真有趣，听起来就像是三藏的紧箍咒。

definition: Xuanzang (602-664) Tang dynasty Buddhist monk and translator, who traveled to India 629-645
Great-Sage Sun/Sun Wukong 孫悟空|孙悟空[Sun1 Wu4 kong1]
Sun Wukong 孫悟空|孙悟空[Sun1 Wu4 kong1], the Monkey King, character with supernatural powers in the novel Journey to the West 西遊記|西游记[Xi1 you2 Ji4]
Sun Wukong, the Monkey King, character with supernatural powers in the novel Journey to the West 西遊記|西游记[Xi1 you2 Ji4]/Son Goku, the main character in Dragon Ball 七龍珠|七龙珠[Qi1 long2 zhu1]
Great Sage the Equal of Heaven, self-proclaimed title of the Monkey King Sun Wukong 孫悟空|孙悟空[Sun1 Wu4 kong1] in the novel Journey to the West 西遊記|西游记[Xi1 you2 Ji4]
the eight precepts (Buddhism)
Tripitaka (602-664), Tang dynasty Buddhist monk and translator who traveled to India 629-645/same as 玄奘
golden cudgel, weapon wielded by Sun Wukong in the novel Journey to the West 西遊記|西游记[Xi1 you2 Ji4]
Zhu Bajie, character in Journey to the West 西遊記|西游记, with pig-like characteristics and armed with a muckrake/Pigsy in Arthur Waley's translation
finger ring (dialect)
tathagata (Buddha's name for himself, having many layers of meaning - Sanskrit: thus gone, having been Brahman, gone to the absolute etc)
key point/crux/(old) Daoist (facetious)
to untie/(fig.) to ease restrictions
White Bone Spirit (in the novel Journey to the West 西遊記|西游记[Xi1 you2 Ji4])/(fig.) sly and cunning person
Sun Wukong, the Monkey King, character with supernatural powers from the novel Journey to the West 西遊記|西游记[Xi1 You2 Ji4]
Sha Wujing
